metadata.title: Resolution of images output from RZ/A3UL

sections.content:
Question:
Can the RZ/A3UL output Full HD (1920x1080) images?
Answer:
Image output of a resolution of WXGA (1280x800) is permitted by the specifications of the RZ/A3UL.
Suitable Products
RZ/A3UL
